item.title: Sed vs Awk
item.description: sed command -- Replace all 'foo' with 'bar' globally. $ sed -i 's/foo/bar/g' <filename> Ref: https://www.tecmint.com/linux-sed-command-tips-tricks/ awk command $ awk Ref: https://likegeeks.com/awk-command/ https://www.lifewire.com/write-awk-commands-and-scripts-2200573 awk ‘{print $0}’ file.name
